title: Falling Down the Pond - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Coming of Age   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Kind Love Interests   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Showbiz   Slow Romance   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Yu Cheng   余酲
description:
In his youth, Ye Qin relied on his good relationships with people and his good looks, maybe a little bit on his luck he would not admit he had, and dragged the unknowing Cheng Feichi into his world. He had naively thought, as long as he was willing, he would be able to hold onto Cheng Feichi for a lifetime. At that time, he had never thought that there would be a day where Cheng Feichi would soar into the sky, without glancing back. He was left alone wandering in the small pond, reluctant to leave it.

A calm and gentle top student gong Cheng Feichi X a naive tsundere fuerdai* shou Ye Qin

*Rich second generation, children from rich entrepreneurs>
